Description: Fragment of foot of Attic black-glazed pottery small open vase (bowl?); ring foot. Glazed inside; reserved outside at junction of wall and foot; stand-ring reserved, and underside of floor, with dot and two rings in glaze. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 564)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1847)
